universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Ensure all text on maps has a solid background or heavy shadow for readability.
Mobile buttons must be at least 44px height for touch targets.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all coordinates, IDs, and financial figures.
Always provide a 'List View' alternative to 'Map View' for accessibility.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the Admin Dashboard using the 'Control Room' grid layout. For the Mobile view, prioritize the 'Visit Workflow' with large, easy-to-tap buttons. Use Leaflet for all map interactions. Ensure the 'Live Tracking' feature uses distinct markers for different user states (Active, Idle, Offline).
